& Mobile Banking.

Payments.
•   Excellent ability to act as bridge between business and technology teams globally.

•   Trying to be Agile since 3 years.

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
CURRICULUM VITAE

Mail: avs.anand@gmail.com
ANAND VS AKKARAJU	Mobile No: +91-9108288876

SUMMARY
•   8+ years of Techno Functional Experience in Financial Domain inclusive of Payments, Core
& Mobile Banking.
•   Strong Management experience in planning & managing financial applications.
•   Expertise in understanding and reviewing the Application/Product Design and Functional
Requirements.
•   Extensive experience in all facets of project lifecycle from requirements, planning and
inception to deployment that follow best practices in product engineering and ITIL processes.
•   Strong client relationship management skills with focus on Process Implementation.
•   Strong Experience in handling Payments Life Cycle like IMPS, NEFT, RTGS, SWIFT and ATM
Payments.
•   Excellent ability to act as bridge between business and technology teams globally.
•   Expertise in handling ISO 8583 Financial Transaction Messages.
•   Trying to be Agile since 3 years.


TECHNICAL / FUNCTIONAL SKILLS
Domain Skills	Term Deposits, Cash Systems, Mobile Banking and Payments, Core Banking,
Payments Life Cycle. CASA, NPP (New Payment Platform)
Operating System	Linux, Solaris, AIX
RDBMS	Oracle, MySQL
Languages	Java, SQL, PL/SQL, HTML
Tools	HP-Quality Center, ALM, JIRA, Microsoft Excel- Vlookup, Pivot and
Macro, Toad, SQL Developer, T-Cube

CERTIFICATIONS
•   Certified in Business Analysis Intermediate Level - BA201.
•   Certified in SPEL 100 Software Performance Engineering.
•   Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) 9i

WORK HISTORY
CURRENT POSITION
•   Senior Associate Consultant at INFOSYS LIMITED since June 2012 to till date.
PREVIOUS EMPLOYER(S):
•   Assistant Manager at National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) from January 2010 to May
2012.
•   Project Engineer at Institute for Development and Research in Banking Technology (IDRBT) from
October 2008 to December 2009.

PROJECTS

Company: Infosys
Client: Qudos Bank (Quantas)
Duration: November 2016 to till date
Project: Finacle Product Migration
Location: Offshore

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
•   The project is for the new implementation of Core Banking 11.x for the client
•   As part of the team the responsibilities include, leading the team of Term Deposits and Payment
Tracks.
•   Understand the customization done to the product and pass on the Functional Design Documents
to testing team for test case preparation.
•   Anchor the calls with Business Leads to understand the requirements for Strategic Planning.
•   Actively participate in migration strategy for Legacy Core Banking Data.


Company: Infosys
Client: Thailand Military Bank
Duration: April 2016 to October 2016
Project: Finacle Payments 11.x Implementation
Location: Offshore and On-Site (Bangkok)

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
•  Test Management, Defect Management and Test Planning, coordinate and manage the Test
design, Test Execution phases.
•  Conduct and drive the defect triage calls.
•  Plan and track the EOD processes for SIT and UAT.
•  Prepare Test Planning documents for system Integration Testing (SIT) and User Acceptance
Testing (UAT).
•  Understanding the solution, preparing functional test cases and actively participating in
functional testing of the same.


Company: Infosys
Client: Development Bank of Singapore (DBS)
Duration: December 2014 to April 2016
Project: Finacle Core - India Release Customization

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
•  The Client uses Finacle Product for Core Banking. Bank staff requires various customizations in
product for Simplification of day to day activities.
•  Responsible for Understanding the Solution and Preparation of Functional Test Cases.
•  Actively participated in functional testing for the same.
•  Responsible for end to end functional testing and UAT.
•  Verifying defects, tracking & attending defect triage meetings.


Company: Infosys
Client: Australian Post
Duration: December, 2013 to November 2014
Project: Finacle Digital Commerce - Multi Wallet Framework for Mobile Platform

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
•  Understanding the Solution Provided and Designing the Functional Test Plan.
•  Actively involved in reviews of the Solution Design and suggested necessary changes.
•  Preparing Functional Test Cases for End to End functional testing.
•  Actively involved in providing necessary inputs to the Automation for automating the testing
process.
•  Actively involved in providing necessary inputs to the Performance testing team for performance
testing of the application.

Company: Infosys
Client: Standard Bank of South Africa
Duration: October, 2013 to December 2013
Project: Finacle Digital Commerce - Voucher Store

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
•  Prepared ISO 8583 specification document for voucher transactions.
•  Actively involved in high level design (HLD) and solution document reviews.
•  Played a key role in customization, testing and implementation of the ISO middleware component
called FinDoot.
•  Designed test cases from Requirements, Functional Specifications and Design Documents.
•  Responsible for end to end functional testing and UAT.
•  Verifying defects, tracking & attending defect triage meetings.

Company: Infosys
Client: Airtel
Duration: June, 2012 to September, 2013
Project: Finacle Digital Commerce - mWallet IMPS

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
•  Client requirements analysis and solution document preparation.
•  Played a key role in design, development, testing and implementation of new product FinDoot, and
ISO middleware component.
•  Preparation of Test Plan and Test Scripts, Execution and reporting the bugs.
•  Responsible for end to end functional testing and UAT.
•  Verifying defects, tracking & attending defect triage meetings.
•  Responsible for defining error codes and ISO messages configuration in database.


Company: National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI)
Client: All Leading Banks in India
Duration: From October, 2010 to May, 2012
Project: Inter Bank Mobile Payment Services (IMPS)

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
•  Inter Bank Mobile payment services facilitates customers to use mobile instruments as
channel for accessing their bank accounts and perform interbank fund transfer in real time.
•  Gathering requirements from new member banks to initiate the testing process.
•  Guiding Member Bank through the customized ISO 8583 message formats.
•  Scheduling the testing process and production movement for the New Member Banks
and ensuring completion of task as scheduled.
•  Guiding Member Banks through the Dispute Management System and perform Dispute
Management User Acceptance Test.


Company: IDRBT & NPCI
Client: All Leading Banks in India
Duration: From October, 2008 to September, 2010
Project: National Financial Switch

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
•  National Financial Switch is countries Apex switch. NFS switches ATM transactions for 75
•  Member Banks with ATM cover more than 140000 ATMs in India.
•  Guiding Member Bank through the customized ISO 8583 message formats.
•  Scheduling the testing process and production movement for the New Member Banks
and ensuring completion of task as scheduled.
•  Guiding Member Banks through the Dispute Management System and perform Dispute
Management User Acceptance Test.
•  Worked on implementation of PCIDSS on National Financial switch.

ACADEMICS

Degree	Board/Institution	Year
Post-Graduation Program in	Great Lakes Institute of Management, Chennai	2017
Business Analytics (PGPBA)	(Pursuing)
Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech)  B.V Raju Institute of Technology (BVRIT), Affiliated to 2006
in Information Technology (IT)   JNTU University, Hyderabad.


PERSONAL DETAILS

Sex: Male
Date of Birth: 18/11/1984
Language known: English, Hindi, and Telugu
Visa Details: Business Visa to USA valid till 2020

DECLARATION
I hereby solemnly declare that all the above-furnished details are correct to the best of my knowledge.
Anand VS Akkaraju

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: ANAND VS AKKARAJU's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Database), and slightly concentrated in Sales (mostly Entry Level). ANAND VS AKKARAJU has 8 years of work experience, with several years tenure in management, including a low-level position.

sov:Findings.sov:Information: The following section in the resume contains more content than the work history and education sections combined: 'PROJECTS'. This usually indicates a major problem with section headers or formatting within the resume.

sov:Information: The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include contact info at the top of the resume.
The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: WORK HISTORY (2 occurrences). Each section should only appear once in a resume.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
The following educational degree does not have a degree name: DEG-3. Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.

sov:Findings.sov:Information: The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Domain Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead included in the descriptions of work history or education.
